title: (Illustrated Classic Arabian Erotica) The Perfumed Garden
description:
The Perfumed Garden is a beautiful piece of Arabic erotica (and IMHO a much more entertaining read than the original Kamasutra). This particular edition includes classic illustrations from the aforementioned book, as well as quotes from "Arabian Nights" (yes, the original Arabian Nights is quite erotic), "The Fountains of Pleasure" as well as "A Night in a Moorish Harem", etc.

My respect goes out to the other ebook uploaders here who take the time to painstakingly scan and seed such works of literary art. Anyone who thinks it&#039;s easy, should try scanning an entire book and see what it feels like. For me, this was a labour of love. I hope you enjoy it as much as I do.

Please download and seed as much as you can.
